Hello, if anyone is reading this, I am truly touched, I practice programming and really want to create something truly aesthetically beautiful and mesmerizing, I like working with unusual forms of applications and thank you again for reading this. Programmer I don’t expect much, I want to gain experience and interact with real professionals, I would like to understand from the inside how and what works and of course help. I do not have a specialized education, I study in courses and on my own, I try to practice and read literature, now I am interested in Computer Architecture and I devote a lot of time to this. Dmitry\nSokovykh Expectations From Work Education
